verses.text: \w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w controversy|strong="H7379"\w* \w between|strong="H0996"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* call \w upon|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w judges|strong="H8199"\w*: \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w give|strong="H6663"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* prize \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* whom \w they|strong="H3588"\w* perceive \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w just|strong="H4941"\w*: \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* whom \w they|strong="H3588"\w* find \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w condemn|strong="H7561"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* wickedness.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w see|strong="H0518"\w* \w that|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w offender|strong="H7563"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* worthy \w of|strong="H1121"\w* stripes: \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w lay|strong="H5307"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w cause|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w beaten|strong="H5221"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H5221"\w*. \w According|strong="H1767"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w measure|strong="H4557"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* sin \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w measure|strong="H4557"\w* \w also|strong="H0518"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* stripes \w be|strong="H1961"\w*:

\w Yet|strong="H3254"\w* \w so|strong="H6435"\w*, \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w exceed|strong="H3254"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* number \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w*: \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* depart shamefully torn \w before|strong="H5869"\w* thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w muzzle|strong="H2629"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* treadeth out thy corn \w on|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* floor.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* dieth \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w deceased|strong="H4191"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w marry|strong="H3947"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w another|strong="H0259"\w*: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w raise|strong="H3947"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* seed \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*:

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* first son \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* call \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* abolished \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w brother’s|strong="H0251"\w* \w wife|strong="H2994"\w*, \w who|strong="H0376"\w* \w by|strong="H0413"\w* law belongeth \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w woman|strong="H8034"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w city|strong="H8179"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w call|strong="H0559"\w* \w upon|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* ancients, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w My|strong="H3947"\w* \w husband’s|strong="H2993"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* refuseth \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w raise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w brother’s|strong="H0251"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w wife|strong="H2994"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5975"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w cause|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w sent|strong="H3947"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* forthwith, \w and|strong="H5975"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w ask|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*. If \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w answer|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w wife|strong="H1696"\w*:

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w woman|strong="H1004"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w come|strong="H5066"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* ancients, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* take \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w shoe|strong="H5275"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w foot|strong="H7272"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w spit|strong="H3417"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w brother’s|strong="H0251"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* unshod.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w two|strong="H5221"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* words \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* begin \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w fight|strong="H5327"\w* \w against|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w other|strong="H0259"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* other’s \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* willing \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* \w out|strong="H2388"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w stronger|strong="H2388"\w*, \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w put|strong="H7971"\w* \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w take|strong="H2388"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* secrets,

Thou shalt \w cut|strong="H7112"\w* \w off|strong="H7112"\w* \w her|strong="H7112"\w* \w hand|strong="H3709"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou \w be|strong="H3808"\w* moved \w with|strong="H5869"\w* \w any|strong="H3808"\w* \w pity|strong="H2347"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w her|strong="H7112"\w* regard.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* divers \w weights|strong="H0068"\w* \w in|strong="H1419"\w* thy \w bag|strong="H3599"\w*, \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w greater|strong="H1419"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w less|strong="H6996"\w*:

\w Neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w greater|strong="H1419"\w* \w bushel|strong="H0374"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w less|strong="H6996"\w*.

Thou shalt \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w just|strong="H0834"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w true|strong="H3068"\w* \w weight|strong="H0068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w bushel|strong="H0374"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* equal \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w true|strong="H3068"\w*: \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou mayest \w live|strong="H0748"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w land|strong="H0127"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* abhorreth \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* doth \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hateth \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w injustice|strong="H5766"\w*.

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w what|strong="H0834"\w* Amalec \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H4714"\w* thee \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* thou camest \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*:

\w How|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w met|strong="H7136"\w* thee: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* slew \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hindmost \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* army, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* sat \w down|strong="H1870"\w*, \w being|strong="H0430"\w* \w weary|strong="H5889"\w*, \w when|strong="H0834"\w* thou wast spent \w with|strong="H0430"\w* hunger \w and|strong="H0430"\w* labour, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* feared \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w rest|strong="H5117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* subdued \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H5159"\w* \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w promised|strong="H5414"\w* thee: thou shalt blot \w out|strong="H3423"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H2143"\w* \w from|strong="H8478"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*. \w See|strong="H0834"\w* thou \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*.
